nothing on this laptop works with ubuntu: change permissions to 777 on /dev/hdc (make sure /dev/hdc is indeed the cd-rom)
then "sudo ls" and check if it contains the files that should be on the cd
or even "man cd" so you can see if it shows a man page for cd - if it shows u options its not that bad
